title: Understanding the Purpose
text: Naming a section of a worksheet can be very useful. Think about what you might want to do with a specific part of your data.

title: Printing Specific Sections
text: Consider how naming a section might help when you only want to print a specific part of your worksheet.

hintAnswer: this allows you to simply specify which part of the worksheet you want to print when you want to print just a portion of it
title: Choosing the Correct Reason
text: Why would naming a section of a worksheet be beneficial when printing?
choices: this allows you to simply specify which part of the worksheet you want to print when you want to print just a portion of it
to make the worksheet more coherent
to print something, you must name the section
